data.lyric:
[ti:You Need To Calm Down]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:You Need To Calm Down]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Need To Calm Down - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:03.99]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:07.99]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:11.98]You are somebody that I don't know
[00:14.16]But you're taking shots at me
[00:15.71]Like it's Patrón
[00:16.65]And I'm just like d**n
[00:19.47]It's 7 am
[00:23.20]Say it in the street that's a knock out
[00:25.67]But you say it in a tweet that's a cop out
[00:28.07]And I'm just like hey
[00:30.97]Are you ok
[00:34.28]And I ain't trying to mess with your self-expression
[00:36.42]But I've learned the lesson that
[00:37.68]Stressin' and obsessing 'bout somebody else is no fun
[00:42.75]And snakes and stones never broke my bones so
[00:45.74]Ohhhhh
[00:50.56]You need to calm down
[00:53.40]You're being too loud
[00:56.19]And I'm just like
[00:56.90]Ohhhhh
[01:01.86]You need to just stop
[01:04.66]Like can you just not
[01:06.09]Step on my gown
[01:07.34]You need to calm down
[01:14.01]You are somebody that we don't know
[01:16.53]But you're coming at my friends like a missile
[01:19.00]Why are you mad
[01:21.66]When you could be GLAAD
[01:25.27]Sunshine on the street at the parade
[01:27.94]But you would rather be in the dark ages
[01:30.24]Making that sign
[01:31.49]
[01:32.67]Must've taken all night
[01:36.60]You just need to take several seats
[01:38.00]And then try to restore the peace
[01:39.46]And control your urges to scream
[01:40.85]About all the people you hate
[01:44.75]Cause shade never made anybody less gay so
[01:47.85]Ohhhhh
[01:52.70]You need to calm down
[01:55.54]You're being too loud
[01:58.32]And I'm just like
[01:59.10]Ohhhhh
[02:03.98]You need to just stop
[02:06.77]Like can you just not
[02:08.38]Step on his gown
[02:09.48]You need to calm down
[02:10.96]And we see you over there on the internet
[02:13.76]Comparing all the girls who are killing it
[02:16.44]But we figured you out
[02:18.19]We all know now
[02:19.67]We all got crowns
[02:20.87]You need to calm down
[02:21.79]Ohhhhh
[02:26.57]You need to calm down
[02:28.02]You need to calm down
[02:29.38]You're being too loud
[02:30.70]You're being too loud
[02:32.08]And I'm just like
[02:32.91]Ohhhhh
[02:37.84]You need to just stop
[02:39.60]Can you stop
[02:40.69]Like can you just not
[02:42.08]Step on our gowns
[02:43.44]You need to calm down
data.trans:
[ti:你需要冷静一下]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:你需要冷静一下]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.99]//
[00:07.98]//
[00:11.98]你们不过是我根本不认识的陌生人
[00:14.16]而你们却将摄像头齐齐对准我
[00:15.71]像是有人雇你来做的工作一样
[00:16.65]我只能爆句粗口
[00:19.47]现在才早上7点
[00:23.20]随意就散播所谓新闻 真是一记重拳
[00:25.67]但你躲在屏幕后发推文 不过是虚张声势
[00:28.07]我只想说 嘿
[00:30.97]你没事吧
[00:34.28]我不会试着去纠正你的言辞
[00:36.42]因为我早就吸取教训 不会再重蹈覆辙
[00:37.68]对一个人过分施压纠缠 真的没有什么格调
[00:42.75]肆意造谣和疯狂抨击再也不能伤害我一分了
[00:45.74]//
[00:50.56]你需要冷静一下
[00:53.40]你真的很聒噪
[00:56.19]而我只是
[00:56.90]//
[01:01.86]你需要消停一会儿
[01:04.66]你能不能不要再
[01:06.09]胡编乱踩我
[01:07.34]你需要冷静一下
[01:14.01]你们不过是我根本不认识的陌生人
[01:16.53]但你却像是导弹般肆意抨击我的朋友们
[01:19.00]为何你这样怒气冲冲？
[01:21.66]而你本可以成为GLAAD的一员
[01:25.27]灿烂的阳光洒落大地
[01:27.94]而你宁愿选择站在黑暗地带
[01:30.22]制作抵制标语牌
[01:32.67]你们一定整晚没睡吧？
[01:36.60]你们需要坐下冷静一会儿
[01:38.00]努力让心恢复以往平和
[01:39.46]然后试着控制自己
[01:40.85]对你们讨厌的那些人的怒火
[01:44.75]因为敌意并不会改变任何现实
[01:47.85]//
[01:52.70]你需要冷静一下
[01:55.54]你真的很聒噪
[01:58.32]而我只是
[01:59.10]//
[02:03.98]你需要消停一会儿
[02:06.77]你能不能不要再
[02:08.38]胡编乱踩他
[02:09.48]你需要冷静一下
[02:10.96]网上随处可见你活跃的身影
[02:13.76]对各种女孩们随意品头论足
[02:16.44]但是我们早就看穿了你
[02:18.19]我们都清楚 
[02:19.67]我们都有自己的骄傲
[02:20.87]你需要冷静一下
[02:21.79]//
[02:26.57]你需要冷静一下
[02:28.02]你需要冷静一下
[02:29.38]你真的很聒噪
[02:30.70]你真的很聒噪
[02:32.08]而我只是
[02:32.91]//
[02:37.84]你需要消停一会儿
[02:39.60]你能不能闭嘴
[02:40.69]你能不能不要再
[02:42.08]胡编乱踩
[02:43.44]你需要冷静一下
